backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, manga entry CRUD operations with pagination (30 per page), genre management, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence issues: black screen background making content invisible, text visibility requiring mouse selection, and pink heart icon styling verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including components for authentication, manga management, layout with collapsible header, pagination, and styling with OKLCH warm sepia/ink palette.
frontend/docs/PREDEPLOY_LAYOUT_VERIFICAT: Pre-deployment checklist for verifying layout components (AppLayout, MangaListPage, AddMangaDialog) across mobile/tablet/desktop viewports to catch regressions before deployment.
frontend/docs/REBASELINE_FROM_LIVE.md: Documentation of February 6, 2026 rebaseline process that restored correct layout from live deployment after draft versions 44-45 introduced layout corruption.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file (content truncated or not provided).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title describing single-user manga watchlist with Internet Identity and pagination, and root div mounting React app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API calls, with install/activate lifecycle handlers and message-based cache clearing support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, service worker registration, profile setup dialog for new users, and conditional rendering of MangaListPage wrapped in BackendConnectionProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Login/logout button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, clears all caches (React Query, manga, IndexedDB, service worker) on logout, and displays appropriate icons and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup, with form validation and submission handling via useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/APP_LAYOU: Comprehensive regression testing checklist for AppLayout component covering header collapse/expand behavior, sticky positioning, footer placement, responsive design, and known issues to avoid.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component with collapsible sticky header (logo, title, login button), main content area, and footer with attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Regression testing checklist for Add Manga dialog ensuring proper scrolling, viewport constraints (90vh, 400px max-height body), fixed header, and accessibility across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog form for adding new manga entries with fields for title, alternate titles, genres (with custom genre support), cover images, synopsis, chapters, status, and rating; includes form validation and backend connection checks.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that automatically scrolls long manga titles vertically with pause-on-hover functionality, detecting overflow and applying CSS animations conditionally.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: Draggable popup displaying manga cover image and title cycling through alternates, with persistent position tracking, cached cover images, and click-outside-to-close behavior.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: React component for uploading and managing multiple cover images with drag-and-drop, upload progress tracking, and image preview grid with delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog component for editing manga entry details including title, genres, cover images, synopsis, and chapter counts with delta-based updates and custom genre support.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Simple dialog component for editing manga notes with a textarea, save/cancel actions, and backend connection status handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Collapsible sticky panel that wraps MangaListControls, providing filters, search, sorting, and watchlist alignment controls with expand/collapse functionality.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Renders genres in a 3-column grid with checkboxes, dynamically measuring and aligning items to ensure uniform column widths per row.
frontend/src/components/manga/MANGA_LIST: Comprehensive checklist document for verifying MangaListPage layout integrity including row alignment, overflow behavior, loading states, and responsive design across viewports.
Main manga card component displaying cover image, title cycling, rating, bookmark, chapter progress, completion status, and notes with popover editors and hover interactions.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides filtering and sorting controls for the manga list, including search inputs for title/synopsis/notes, genre multi-select popover, bookmark/completed toggles, sort options, and watchlist alignment buttons.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main page component that orchestrates manga list display with pagination, filtering, sorting, and connection state management; handles offline mode and auto-prunes invalid genre selections.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Renders a manga card with edit and delete action buttons, managing dialogs for editing and confirming deletion of manga entries.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Displays a fixed overlay with manga notes text in a styled amber box, rendered via portal when visible.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Provides pagination UI with previous/next buttons, numbered page buttons with ellipsis for large page counts, and a jump-to-page input field.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: React context provider that creates a singleton backend connection instance to prevent multiple competing connection loops across the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Extended actor hook that delegates to the singleton backend connection hook, providing connection state tracking and retry functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: React Query hook that fetches all manga entries from the backend with offline fallback to IndexedDB and localStorage caches, writing successful fetches to both cache layers.
Manages backend actor initialization and readiness with timeout handling, automatic retries with exponential backoff, session generation to prevent stale updates, and comprehensive diagnostics including connection phase tracking and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Provides access to the singleton backend connection state from BackendConnectionContext, ensuring only one connection attempt loop is active at a time.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Delegates to the singleton connection hook to provide backend readiness state, mapping connection status to readiness status and exposing retry functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Returns a cover image URL preferring cached blob from IndexedDB when available, falling back to network URL while asynchronously fetching and caching in the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile, with proper backend readiness checks and authentication validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing AuthClient lifecycle, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Extracts and returns a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries in the library.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, rating, bookmarking, and managing notes for manga entries, with query invalidation and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: Manages persistent popup positioning with localStorage, handling centering, clamping to viewport bounds, and window resize events to keep the popup visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: Custom React hook that measures and synchronizes the width of multiple watchlist row elements to ensure uniform sizing, using ResizeObserver and handling image loads and window resizes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space (warm sepia/ink theme with vermillion accents), dark mode support, and rainbow animation utilities for text, glow, and border effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Service worker registration utilities including registration on window load and a function to clear service worker cache with message-based confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Error classification utility that categorizes backend errors (connecting, transient, authorization, application, timeout) and determines retry behavior, with special handling for superseded/stale attempts.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Provides a unified error message constant and assertion function for checking backend readiness across the application.
frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.t: Utility function that formats chapter numbers, displaying integers without decimal points and preserving decimals when present.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: Generic IndexedDB wrapper utilities providing CRUD operations (get, put, delete, getAllKeys) for 'mangaMetadata' and 'coverImages' object stores.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: IndexedDB-based cache for manga cover image blobs, keyed by principal, stableId, and URL hash, with functions to fetch, store, retrieve, and clear cached images.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Legacy localStorage-based cache for manga entries with serialization/deserialization of MangaEntry objects, including version control and cache management functions.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: Provides IndexedDB caching for manga entry metadata with per-principal namespacing, including serialization/deserialization and read/write/clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Utility for wrapping promises with hard timeouts, providing TimeoutError class and withTimeout/createTimeout functions.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Implements bounded exponential backoff retry logic with jitter, configurable timeouts, and a RetryManager class for manual retry control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, typography plugin, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a black screen display issue where content is invisible except for a pink heart icon, with text only visible when highlighted.
